General.Name: Jiangsu Lettall Electronic Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Lettall Electronic Co.,Ltd produces and sells electronic components and metal structural parts in China. The company offers LCD TV precision metal stamping structural parts, precision metal face frame, base, mold, and other electronic components used in LCD TV, LCD display, and other flat panel displays. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Yixing, China.

6.Name: Mr. Jun  Shao
6.Title: Head of Internal Audit Department & Supervisor
